# IOLockFree | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ DriverKit ](/documentation/driverkit)

- [ IOLockFree ](/documentation/driverkit/iolockfree)

-  IOLockFree 

Function# IOLockFree

DriverKitiOSiPadOSmacOS

```
void IOLockFree(struct IOLock * lock);
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/driverkit/iolockfree#parameters)

`lock`Pointer to the allocated lock.

## [Discussion](/documentation/driverkit/iolockfree#discussion)

Frees a mutex.

Frees a lock allocated with IOLockAlloc. Mutex should be unlocked with no waiters.
